title: Ultimate spring potato salad
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons wholegrain mustard', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 bunch spring onions, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons crème fraîche', '4 cornichons, finely chopped', '1/2 red onion, finely chopped', 'juice of 1 lemon', '6 sticks celery, finely sliced', '3 hard boiled eggs, chopped', '55g black olives, sliced', '1.35kg Jersey Royal potatoes - cooked, halved and chilled', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'chives, to taste']
